message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item. I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'm not convinced by your enthusiasm, Alice. I need more information before making a decision.
